review: The Fire TV Stick is everything that I hoped it would be and more!  Since the moment I plugged it in to my TV I have been happily exploring all of the free TV shows, movies, and videos at my fingertips.  And, because I subscribe to Prime and use the cloud, I was immediately able to access all of my photos and music too!  I can't believe that I waited this long to get one.
